alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 9:08PM CDT until April 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County. For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Oconto River above Oconto. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, up to 2 feet of water is covering a campground in Oconto. Floodwaters begin to reach city streets adjacent to the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and crest at 11.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon.
